purpose: To provide a unified framework for building, testing, and deploying Language Model-based agents.
principle: Leverages OpenAI's GPT models and LangChain for building agents, integrating tools, prompts, and frameworks.
reusability: Highly modular with plug-and-play components, supports integration with various AI models and tools.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack extensive documentation and real-world testing.
